DOC.brief_summary: To determine if there is a relationship between people with open fractures and the season and location of where the injury occurred and the infections they develop
DOC.brief_title: Regional and Seasonal Variations in the Incidence and Causative Organisms for Post-traumatic Wound Infections and Osteomyelitis After Open Fractures
DOC.criteria: Open Fracture treated surgically between distal radius and distal tibia GSW Unable to follow for one year
